author: Paul Cullen
title: Coronavirus outbreaks in nursing homes, hospitals to be tackled in new plans
description: Outbreak teams are to be set up to combat specific clusters of the Covid-19 virus
content:
Public health officials are to ramp up efforts to tackle coronavirus outbreaks in nursing homes and hospitals in response to a large increase of clusters of the disease in residential settings.
